Translations.Text: religi! - Religi de your patr Abraham. Li est 1 who nom vi Submitters originally! Tiel messenger serv witness vi vi dejxor witnesses among des popol. Do vi observ Kontakt Prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat) ten fast DI; Li est your Lord put Lord put Supporter. . . [23:1] Successful ja est believers
who est reverent dum their Kontakt Prayers (Salat)
Ili evit vain talk
Ili don their obligatory charity (Zakat)
Ili argument their chastity
Nur kun their spouses those est rightfully theirs do ili hav sexual relations; ili ne est blamed
Those transgress these lim est transgressors
When gxi ven depon konfid al them tro as any agreements ili far ili est trustworthy
Ili observ their Kontakt Prayers (Salat) regularly
Such est inheritors
Ili hered Paradise wherein ili abide forever
Ni kre human est el nepr kind da kot
Subsequently ni reproduced him tiny gut ej put protekt repository

Tiam ni developed gut into pend (embryo) tiam developed pend (embryo) into bite-size (fetus) tiam kre bite-size (fetus) into ost tiam kovr ost karn. Ni tiel produkt neo creature. Ben est DI put Creator
Tiam later sur, vi mort
Tiam Tag Resurrection vi resurrected
Ni kre vi 7 univers tavol ni est neniam unaware de single creature them
Ni send down cxiel akv exact mezur tiam ni store gxi muel Certainly ni let gxi escape
Kun gxi ni produkt por vi orchards de dat palm grapes all kinds da frukt various foods
Ankaux arb indigxen al Sinai produkt ole ankaux as frand eaters
livestock proviz vi lecion. Ni let vi trink (lakt) el their bellies vi deriv ali benefits el them kelk da them vi uz por food
Sur them sur sxip vi rajd
Ni send Noah his popol dir O my popol worship DI. Vi ne hav ali di Him. Vi ne est righteous
Estr disbelieved his popol dir This est ne plur than human vi wants gajn prominence vi. Hav DI willed Li send angxel! Ni neniam auxd anything this our ancestors
Li simply hom ir crazy Just ignor him por awhile
Li dir My Lord grant me victory ili disbelieved me

Ni tiam inspir him Far watercraft our watchful okul en accordance kun our inspiration! When our komand ven atmosphere bol up put gxi par de cxiu kind (da your domesticated best) your famili escept those kondamn doomed Ne parol al Me sur behalf da those transgressed ili dron
Once vi sald together those est vi watercraft vi dir ‘Lauxd DI por sav us el evil popol
Dir ‘My Lord let me disembark ben location; Vi est bon deliverer
These proviz sufficient proofs vi! Ni certainly put vi test
Subsequently ni establ another generaci post them
Ni send al them messenger el them dir Vi worship DI! Vi ne hav ali di Him. Vi ne est righteous
Estr his popol disbelieved rejected ide Hereafter - Kvankam ni proviz por them generously en this life - Dir This est ne plur than human est vi! Li mangx el ki vi mangx trink as vi trink
Se vi obe human est vi tiam vi est really losers
Li promes vi vi mort turn into polv ost vi ven re
Impossible impossible ja est ki promes vi
Ni nur viv this life - Ni viv mort! - Kaj ni neniam resurrected
Li est just hom fabricated mensog atribu them DI! Ni neniam kred him
Li dir My Lord grant me victory ili disbelieved me
Li dir Baldaux ili est sorry
retribution strik them equitably do ni torn them ruin. wicked popol pere
Subsequently ni establ ali generaci them
Ne community advance its predetermined sort nor delay gxi
Tiam ni send our messengers en succession. Cxiu temp messenger ir his community ili disbelieved him. Consequently ni annihilated them 1 ali far them histori! Popol disbelieved pere
Tiam ni send Moses his frat Aaron our revelations profound proof
Al Pharaoh his elders ili torn arrogant! Ili est oppressive popol
Ili dir ni kred 2 hom whose popol est our sklav
Ili rejected 2 kaj consequently ili annihilated
Ni don Moses scripture ili direkt
Ni far fil Mary his mother sign ni don them rifugx mesa food drink
O vi messengers mangx bon provisions work righteousness! Mi est fully aware da cxio vi do
Such est your congregation - 1 congregation - Mi est your Lord vi reverence Me
Ili larm into disput factions; each parti felicx ki ili hav
Do just las them their confusion por awhile
Do ili opini ekde ni proviz them mon infan
Ni dusx them blessings? Ja ili ne hav ide
Surely those est reverently conscious de their Lord
who kred en revelations their Lord
Kaj who neniam set any idols their Lord
As ili don their charities their kor est fully reverent. Ili recognize ti ili summoned their Lord
Ili est eager do righteous works ili kondur en doing them
Ni neniam sxargx any anim its means ni keep record utters truth. Ne 1 sufer injustice
their mens est oblivious al this ili commit works do ne conform this; their works est evil
Tiam when ni requite their estr retribution ili plend
Ne plend nun; vi don all help el us
My proofs prezent vi vi torn your kalkan
Vi est tro arrogant akcept them vi defiantly disregarded them
Why ili ne reflect this scripture? Ili ne realize ke ili Do ricev io hav neniam ating their ancestors
Ili failed recognize their messenger? this ili est disregarding him
Ili decid ke li hav est crazy Ja li brought truth them plej de them hate truth
Ja se truth conformed their wishes tie est chaos heavens ter; cxio them corrupted Ni don them their proof ili disregarding their proof
Vi pet them wage Your Lord's wage est far put. Li est put Provider
plej assuredly vi invit them rekt path
Those disbelieve Hereafter surely deviate dekstr path
Eben when ni dusx them kun mercy, relieved their problem ili plongx profund transgression ad blunder
Ecx when ni aflikt them retribution ili neniam torn their Lord imploring
Subsequently when ni requited them severe retribution ili incurred ili shocked
Li est 1 who granted vi auxd eyesight cerb! Rarely est vi appreciative
Li est Unu establ vi ter kaj Him vi summoned
Li est Unu controls life death Li est 1 who alternates nokt tag. Vi ne kompren
Ili dir ki their ancestors dir
Ili dir Post ni mort igx polv ost ni get resurrected
Such promes don us our parents en des preter. These est ne plur than tales el preter
Dir, "Al whom aparten ter everyone gxi se vi kon
Ili dir, "Al DI. Dir tiam vi ne pren heed
Dir Who est Lord de 7 univers; Lord de great dominion
Ili dir DI. Dir tiam vi ne torn righteous
Dir En whose man est all sovereignty all ajx Li nur unu proviz help bezon neni help vi est kon
Ili dir DI. Dir Kie vol vi ir wrong
Ni don them truth while ili est liars
DI NENIAM begotten FIL. Nor est tie ever any ali di Him. Otherwise each di deklar independence his creations ili kondur each ali por dominance! DI GLOR; far their PRETEND
Knower de all sekret declarations; Li exalted far hav partner
Dir My Lord Vi montr me (retribution) ili incurred
My Lord let me ne est unu de transgressing popol
Al montr vi (retribution) ni rezerv them est io ni easily do
Do counter their evil works goodness; ni est fully aware da their pretend
Dir My Lord mi streb rifugx Vi el flustr diabl
Mi streb rifugx en Vi my Lord lest ili ven me
When death ven 1 de them li dir My Lord send me
Mi tiam work righteousness cxio mi las. Ne ver! This est false pretend li far. barrier separate his anim this mond resurrection
When korn ne blov relations them ekzist ke tag nor vol ili zorg 1 another
As por those weights est heavy ili est winners
Those weights est light est unu perd their anim; ili abide Infer forever
Fajr overwhelm their vizagx ili last miserably therein
Ne est My revelations recited vi vi kept rejecting them
Ili dir Our Lord our wickedness overwhelmed us ni popol ir astray
(Our Lord pren us out da this; se ni return our old behavior) tiam ni est really wicked
Li dir Abide therein humiliated ne parol al Me
Grup My servants uz dir ‘Our Lord ni kred tial forgive us dusx us kun mercy! De all merciful unu Vi est plej Merciful
Vi mok ridiculed them extent ke vi forges Me Vi uz rid them
Mi rekompenc them hodiaux dors their steadfastness far them winners
Li dir "Kiel long vi last ter? Kiel many jar
Ili dir Ni last tag part de tag! Pet those counted
Li dir En fakt, vi rest brief interim vi nur kon
Vi opini ni Did kre vi en vain vi ne est returned us
exalted est DI prav Suveren! tie ne est ali di Him; plej Honorable Lord possessor all auxtoritat
Anyone idolizes DI any ali di any kind da proof li reckoning ripoz his Lord disbelievers neniam sukces
Dir My Lord dusx us forgiveness mercy! De all merciful unu Vi est plej Merciful
